info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 10:26PM MDT until April 22 at 10:45PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN YUMA COUNTY... At 1026 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Paoli to Eckley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Wray, Eckley, Alvin, Clarkville and Wauneta. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 245 and 270. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
